# Hi all!

My name is Bünyamin Atay. I am a doctoral student at Counseling Psychology program in University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee. I am currently working with Dr. Autin. My research interests lie in *psychological wellbeing*, *vocational development*, *measurement in counseling psychology*. In this website, you can find all the avenues I am interested in.
